渱字的基本解释

渱
hóng
〔溃渱〕ａ．（水流）宽广浩大。ｂ．水沸涌。

渱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hóng］
［《廣韻》户公切，平東，匣。］
见“潰渱”。

渱字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　渱； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页635第06
【廣韻】戸公切【集韻】【正韻】胡公切，?音洪。【玉篇】水聲。一曰潰渱，水沸涌也。【左思·吳都賦】潰渱泮汗。【註】謂直望無涯也。　又【集韻】古送切，音貢。水貌。

渱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
渱字的起名意思

暂无。

渱
Basic explanation of words
渱
hóng
[Break] a. (The current) is vast and vast. b. The water is boiling.
渱

["Guangyun" Hu Gongqie, Pingdong, Xie. ]

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　渱; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 635 06
[Guang Yun] Gong Gong cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Hu Gong cut,? Yin Hong. [Jade articles] Water sound. One said the collapse, the water was boiling. [Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu] Kuipan Khan. [Note] It means looking straight to the limitless.　[Jiyun] Ancient delivery cut, sound tribute. Water appearance.
